tool_description: Crypto - Web3 has never been easier. BSC All-in-one tools. Token's API
name: EzWeb3
title: EzWeb3

api_list.name: BNB Price
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ezweb3.p.rapidapi.com/bsc/bnb/price"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ezweb3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ezweb3.p.rapidapi.com/bsc/bnb/price"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ezweb3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
